subtopics.title: Adverbs of Frequency
phrases: I always brush my teeth in the morning.
She usually goes to the gym after work.
He often visits his grandparents on weekends.
They sometimes eat out on Fridays.
We occasionally travel abroad during the holidays.
I frequently read before going to bed.

subtopics.title: Frequency Expressions (specific times)
phrases: I visit my grandparents once a week.
She goes to the cinema twice a month.
He calls his friend three times a day.
We have team meetings four times a month.
They travel abroad five times a year.
Iâ€™ve seen that movie several times.
She has helped me many times.
